name: Death of Carl XV
obverse: Head of Carl XV facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: CARL XV SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG.
reverse: Mother Svea sitting on steps of an altar holding a tablet with the date of death of the king. On top of the altar is a vase with a shining star above the vase.
description: King Carl XV of Sweden died on September 18, 1872 at the age of 46 in Malmö, Sweden.
